info.author: Toben Archer
info.description:
Ceranubis is a small scale distributed computing system designed for minimal setup time and learning curve to be used by hobbists or researches who don't have access to a super computer, or don't have the know how or perhaps permissions necessary to make a cluster computer, but have access to lots of desktops and want to make harness the potential power of all of them.

requires a PostgreSQL server.
info.name: Ceranubis
info.html_description:
Ceranubis is a small scale distributed computing system designed for minimal setup time and learning curve to be used by hobbists or researches who don’t have access to a super computer, or don’t have the know how or perhaps permissions necessary to make a cluster computer, but have access to lots of desktops and want to make harness the potential power of all of them.

requires a PostgreSQL server.
